nodes.label: Buddy Matching Agent
nodes.name: Buddy Matching Agent
nodes.description: Analyzes user profile, mood, interests, and preferences to generate ranked buddy match suggestions with compatibility scores and reasoning.

nodes.label: Icebreaker & Chat Companion Agent
